questions.questionText: Harriet Tubman was a conductor on the Underground Railroad
questions.hint: She made 13 missions to rescue enslaved people

questions.questionText: Frederick Douglass was born a free man
Rosa Parks refused to give up her seat on a bus
questions.hint: This happened in Montgomery, Alabama in 1955

questions.questionText: Martin Luther King Jr. was assassinated in 1968
Malcolm X was a proponent of non-violent resistance
questions.hint: He advocated for self-defense and Black empowerment
